languages.text: "Мон-кай решил{mf||а} обуздать порождение Темных богов? Безнадежная глупость!" {n}Ирлиэт стискивает камень душ и отступает на полшага назад.{/n}

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Ирлиэт бузит, что не будет союзничать с хаосом, надо убить тварь

languages.text: "The mon-keigh has decided to harness the spawn of the Dark Gods? What hopeless stupidity!" {n}Yrliet clutches her spirit stone and takes half a step back.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мон-кай решил{mf||а} обуздать порождение Темных богов? Безнадежная глупость!" {n}Ирлиэт стискивает камень душ и отступает на полшага назад.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The mon-keigh has decided to harness the spawn of the Dark Gods? What hopeless stupidity!" {n}Yrliet clutches her spirit stone and takes half a step back.{/n} "You are about to trade the purity of your soul for an illusion of potency. An unquenchable thirst for power will cost more dearly than you think."

languages.text: 「やれやれ、モン＝ケイは暗黒神の産物までも使役しようと決めたのか？絶望的な愚かさだな！」{n}ユリエットは魂縛石を握りしめ、半歩下がった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh has decided to harness the spawn of the Dark Gods? What hopeless stupidity!" {n}Yrliet clutches her spirit stone and takes half a step back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「やれやれ、モン＝ケイは暗黒神の産物までも使役しようと決めたのか？絶望的な愚かさだな！」{n}ユリエットは魂縛石を握りしめ、半歩下がった。{/n}

languages.text: « {mf|Le|La} mon-keigh veut prendre un rejeton des Dieux Sombres à son service ? Quelle stupidité crasse ! » {n}Yrliet serre sa pierre-esprit dans son poing et recule d'un pas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh has decided to harness the spawn of the Dark Gods? What hopeless stupidity!" {n}Yrliet clutches her spirit stone and takes half a step back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le|La} mon-keigh veut prendre un rejeton des Dieux Sombres à son service ? Quelle stupidité crasse ! » {n}Yrliet serre sa pierre-esprit dans son poing et recule d'un pas.{/n} « Vous êtes sur le point d'échanger la pureté de votre âme contre une illusion de puissance. Cette soif de pouvoir dévorante vous coûtera bien plus que vous l'imaginez ! »

languages.text: “猴子居然打算利用黑暗诸神孽种的力量？何等愚蠢！简直是无可救药！”{n}伊莉耶特紧紧地握着灵魂石，后退了半步。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh has decided to harness the spawn of the Dark Gods? What hopeless stupidity!" {n}Yrliet clutches her spirit stone and takes half a step back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “猴子居然打算利用黑暗诸神孽种的力量？何等愚蠢！简直是无可救药！”{n}伊莉耶特紧紧地握着灵魂石，后退了半步。{/n}“你打算用灵魂的纯洁来换取虚伪的力量。若是一味渴求力量，不知满足，这只会让你付出超乎想象的代价。”

languages.text: «¿{mf|El|La} mon-keigh ahora quiere hacer suyo al engendro de los Dioses Oscuros? ¡Menuda insensatez!». {n}Yrliet agarra su joya espiritual y da medio paso atrás.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh has decided to harness the spawn of the Dark Gods? What hopeless stupidity!" {n}Yrliet clutches her spirit stone and takes half a step back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿{mf|El|La} mon-keigh ahora quiere hacer suyo al engendro de los Dioses Oscuros? ¡Ver para creer!». {n}Yrliet agarra su joya espiritual y da medio paso atrás.{/n} «Está a punto de cambiar la pureza de su alma por una ilusión de poder. Esa sed insaciable de poder le costará más caro de lo que cree».

languages.text: "Der Chem-Pan-Sey hat entschieden, die Brut der Dunklen Götter zu nutzen? Was für eine hoffnungslose Dummheit!" {n}Yrliet umklammert ihren Seelenstein und tritt einen halben Schritt zurück.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh has decided to harness the spawn of the Dark Gods? What hopeless stupidity!" {n}Yrliet clutches her spirit stone and takes half a step back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Chem-Pan-Sey hat entschieden, die Brut der Dunklen Götter zu nutzen? Welch hoffnungslose Dummheit!" {n}Yrliet umklammert ihren Seelenstein und tritt einen halben Schritt zurück.{/n} "Ihr seid dabei, die Reinheit Eurer Seele gegen die Illusion von Macht einzutauschen. Ein unstillbarer Durst nach Macht wird Euch mehr kosten, als Ihr ahnt."

languages.text: "Mon-keigh, Kara Tanrıların bir yaratığından mı faydalanacak şimdi? Ne aptalca!" {n}Yrliet, ruh taşını avuçlayıp geriye bir adım atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh has decided to harness the spawn of the Dark Gods? What hopeless stupidity!" {n}Yrliet clutches her spirit stone and takes half a step back.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “Mon-keigh, Kara Tanrıların bir yaratığından mı faydalanacak şimdi? Ne aptalca!” {n}Yrliet, ruh taşını avuçlayıp geriye bir adım atıyor.{/n}
